summary: A beautiful heiress is kidnapped and held hostage until her wealthy father comes up with a ransom. The heiress develops an attraction to one of her kidnappers, but another member of the gang tries to rape her, leading to a deadly triangle.
cast: Willy Braque|Yves Duffaut|Annie Josse|Virginie Solenn|Alain Tissier|José Bénazéraf
title: L'enfer dans la peau
